author: Tara Law
title: ‘We Are Struggling to Get It Under Control’ Dr. Anthony Fauci Says About the U.S. COVID-19 Outbreak
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the top American infectious disease specialist, warned Sunday that the U.S. is "struggling" with the outbreak of COVID-19.
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci, the top American infectious disease specialist, warned Sunday that the U.S. is “struggling” to curb the outbreak of COVID-19, but said that there are signs that mitigation efforts are working.
In an appearance on CNN’s Face the Nation, Fau… [+2345 chars]
